In England, in the seven days to 07 June, there were 33,887 new confirmed cases (60.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 31 May, there were 19,493 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 74% (14,394 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 12 June is 3,975,399 (7,062.7 cases per 100,000 population).
